keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

#navigating page
map i scrollPageUp
map u scrollPageDown
map r scrollPageUp
map e scrollPageDown
map w scrollToBottom
map q scrollToTop
map U scrollFullPageDown
map I scrollFullPageUp
map D scrollDown
map F scrollUp
map S scrollLeft
map G scrollRight

#change mode
map , enterInsertMode
map . enterVisualMode
map ; enterVisualLineMode

#opening links
map Y LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map y LinkHints.activateMode
map & LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map T LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map t LinkHints.activateMode
map <c-y> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map <c-7> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
#map <a-y> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue #doesn't work with Talon

#marking
map 1 Marks.activateCreateMode

#find mode commands
map p performFind
map P performBackwardsFind

#navigating history
map h goBack
map l goForward
map s goBack
map g goForward

#manipulating tabs
map n removeTab
map N restoreTab
map m createTab
map v removeTab
map V restoreTab
map b createTab
map 8 duplicateTab
map 7 closeTabsOnLeft
map 9 closeTabsOnRight
map 0 closeOtherTabs
map d previousTab
map f nextTab
map j previousTab
map k nextTab
map - firstTab
map = lastTab
map ^ visitPreviousTab
map \ Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

#unmap keys
unmap p,a-nmap gg
unmap <a-f>
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
